thread.title: Knights ground Rockets again

author: Ben Baby
title: Knights ground Rockets again
text:

MARVIN PFEIFFER/ mpfeiffer@express-news.net Photo: Marvin Pfeiffer, Staff / San Antonio Express-News Image 4 of 10 Steele's Mark Jackson (center) tackles Judson's Julon Williams (left) for a loss on the Rockets first offensive play during the first half of their District 25-6A game at Lenhoff Stadium on Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. MARVIN PFEIFFER/ mpfeiffer@express-news.net Steele's Mark Jackson (center) tackles Judson's Julon Williams (left) for a loss on the Rockets first offensive play during the first half of their District 25-6A game at Lenhoff Stadium on Friday, Oct. 23, ... more Image 5 of 10 Judson quarterback Julon Williams (left) tries to get past Steele’s Tavian Carter during the first half. The Rockets fell to the Knights for the sixth time in as many tries in the series. Judson quarterback Julon Williams (left) tries to get past Steele’s Tavian Carter during the first half. The Rockets fell to the Knights for the sixth time in as many tries in the series. MARVIN PFEIFFER/ mpfeiffer@express-news.net Steele's Antoine Cox-Wesley (7) slips out of the grasp of Judson's Dominique Ramsey during the first half of their District 25-6A game at Lenhoff Stadium on Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. MARVIN PFEIFFER/ ... more Image 8 of 10 Steele's Antoine Cox-Wesley (7) is surrounded by Judson's Fredrick Gaines (from left), Dominique Ramsey and Shane Calvin during the first half of their District 25-6A game at Lenhoff Stadium on Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. MARVIN PFEIFFER/ mpfeiffer@express-news.net Steele's Antoine Cox-Wesley (7) is surrounded by Judson's Fredrick Gaines (from left), Dominique Ramsey and Shane Calvin during the first half of their District 25-6A game at Lenhoff Stadium on Friday, Oct. 23, ... more Image 9 of 10 The Judson Rockets combine to stop Steele's Antoine Cox-Wesley (7) during the first half of their District 25-6A game at Lenhoff Stadium on Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. MARVIN PFEIFFER/ mpfeiffer@express-news.net The Judson Rockets combine to stop Steele's Antoine Cox-Wesley (7) during the first half of their District 25-6A game at Lenhoff Stadium on Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. MARVIN PFEIFFER/ mpfeiffer@express-news.net Photo: Marvin Pfeiffer, Staff / San Antonio Express-News Image 10 of 10 Knights ground Rockets again 1 / 10 Back to Gallery In a game featuring two of the state’s top football teams, it was only fitting that the Steele defense stopped Judson’s offense one final time on Friday night.
Judson needed a touchdown to cut into a deficit late in the District 25-6A game, but the Knights kept the Rockets from launching a dramatic comeback. Steele forced a field goal, recovered an onside kick and sealed a 20-13 victory over Judson at Lehnhoff Stadium.
For more, visit ExpressNews.com.
